word_mean: 精确，精密：严格确切地限定的量，例如，测量三个有效数比测量两个有效数更精确。参见accuracy
在统计学中指在同一条件下重复测量可取得相同结果
在一定测量条件下，对某一量的多次测量中各观测值间的离散程度。
对同一物体的某特征重复观察值或对某参数的重复估计值彼此之间的接近程度。

sentence.Network_en: To minimize collateral damage maximum precision in bombing was required.
sentence.Network_cn: 为了尽量减低附带性破坏，轰炸须做到最大程度的精确。

sentence.Network_en: Her precision became a standing joke with colleagues.
sentence.Network_cn: 她事事讲究精确，同事们经常拿这事开玩笑。
以数学般的精确完成的

PerfectNetExp.abs: 机械专业英语词汇（很全） - Lemon Tree ... 几何形状 geometrical 精度 precision 正弦形的 sinusoid.
新大纲四级 - xieyuchao670的日志 - 网易博客 ... precious 珍贵的，贵重的 precision 精确(性)，精密(度) predict 预言，预测，预告.
精字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 精确〖 accurate〗 精确度〖 precision〗 精肉〖 thinmeat〗.

list.abs: 机械词汇的英语翻译(O-T) ... precision alloy 精密合金 precision balance 精密天平 precision casting 精密铸造.
尺寸精度 b. 形状精度 c. 位置精度 Central South University 2.1 尺寸精度尺寸精度(size precision):零件的实际尺寸数值如直径、长度、表面间的距离等与其.
汽车英语词汇 - 老梦的日志 - 网易博客 ... 失蜡铸造 dewaxing casting 精密铸造 precision casting 双金属铸造 bimetal casting.
机械英语词汇|各类常用英语词汇 ... cold chamber die casting 冷式压铸 precision forging 精密锻造 cold forging 冷锻.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: from French précision or Latin praecisio(n-), from praecidere 'cut off' (see precise)

entry.def: If you do something with precision, you do it exactly as it should be done.

example.tran: 唱诗班的演唱准确无误。

example.ex: The interior is planned with a precision the military would be proud of.
example.tran: 内部设计一丝不苟，足以让军方引以为豪。

means.word_mean: 1. the quality of being reproducible in amount or performance;

sentences.sentence: "he handled it with the preciseness of an automaton"
"note the meticulous precision of his measurements"

auth_sentence.content: For such precision to occur, delays are necessary.
auth_sentence.res_content: For such precision to occur, delays are necessary.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: For such precision to occur, delays are necessary.

auth_sentence.content: Making machine gears requires precision tools and considerable expertise.
auth_sentence.res_content: Making machine gears requires precision tools and considerable expertise.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Making machine gears requires precision tools and considerable expertise.

auth_sentence.content: The ETF job requires a high degree of precision.
auth_sentence.res_content: The ETF job requires a high degree of precision.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The ETF job requires a high degree of precision.

stems_affixes.word_buile: con全部+cise切开,杀→把[没用的东西]全部切掉
de加强+cise切开,杀+ive……的→adj.决定性的
incise[v.切,切割]+ive……的→切人的→一针见血的
pre预先+cise切开,杀→预先切好→精确的
excise[v.割去,删去]+ion动作或状态→n.删除,灭绝;切除
incise[v.切,切割]+or物→切[咬]东西的东西→incisor门牙
precise[adj.精确的,清楚的]+ion表名词→n.精密,正确

Sentence.sentence: Same goes for surgeons, who're using robotic systems to perform an ever-growing list of operations-not because the machines save money but because, thanks to the greater precision of robots, the patients recover in less time and have fewer complications, says Dr. Myriam Curet.

sentences.en: Precision instruments are used to help pilots in guiding their aircraft.
sentences.cn: 精密仪器用来帮助飞行员操作飞机。

jushi.english: Precision instruments are used to help pilots in guiding their aircraft.
jushi.chinese: 精密仪器用来帮助飞行员操作飞机。
